textBeforeTable: Track Listing Mikal Cronin’s second album is a sinfully catchy collection of power-pop tunes, perfect for scratching that Beatlesesque pop itch. Though he had an excellent first album and he plays bass for Ty Segall, MCII looks to take Cronin beyond second fiddle with earworms like “Weight.” Pop it onto your record player and let it carry you through the summer. 05/06/2013 Amoeba Review Download CD, Also available in: SHIPS FREE in U.S. $19.98 BUY Mikal Cronin MCII (LP) Tweet MCII (LP) Home View More Superchunk Come Pick Me Up
